It's a sticky note app.

In addition to managing sticky notes in the management console, you can paste memos to each URL.
Stored notes can be opened at any time from the management console.

Please help us to improve the efficiency of work and hobbies.
long.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_4:
It's a sticky note app.

In addition to managing sticky notes in the management console, you can paste memos to each URL.
Stored notes can be opened at any time from the management console.

Please use it to improve the efficiency of your work or hobby.
